```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r loading packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r reading in data}
flights <- fread("nycdata.csv")
flights
```

# 1.

```{r 1}
flights[, .(year, month, day, hour)]
```

# 2.

```{r 2}
flights[carrier == "DL" & origin == "JFK"]
```

# 3.

```{r 3}
flights[carrier == "UA" & month == 3 & air_time < 330]
```

# 4.

```{r 4}
flights %>% 
  filter(carrier == "UA", month == 3, air_time < 330)
```

# 5.

```{r 5}
flights[, c("speed") := .(distance / air_time)]
flights
```

# 6.

```{r 6}
flights %>% 
  mutate(speed = distance / air_time)
```

# 7.

## a.

```{r 7a}
flights[carrier == "UA", carrier := "UniitedAir"]
flights[carrier == "UniitedAir"]
```

## b.

```{r 7b}
flights %>% 
  mutate(carrier = recode(carrier, "UA"= "UniitedAir")) %>% 
  filter(carrier == "UniitedAir")
```
